title: Ukraine war live: Macron denies warning Ukraine about potential US betrayal
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron denied the authenticity of a leaked transcript of a phone call with Ukrainian officials. He stated, "I deny everything" in response to questions about the document. The leak has raised questions regarding France's stance on the ongoing conflict in Ukraine.

title: Merino may keep place as Arsenal striker, Rodri still unavailable for Manchester City – football live
summary: England and Scotland are gearing up for a busy weekend as they anticipate key updates regarding their World Cup qualifications. The news highlights the excitement surrounding their upcoming matches and possibilities. Fans can look forward to crucial developments affecting both teams.

title: World Cup 2026 draw: updates as the teams await fate in Washington DC – live
summary: Follow our writers for live updates from the draw in Washington, D.C., for the upcoming 48-team tournament scheduled for next summer. Stay tuned for the latest news and developments as the teams are announced. Don't miss this exciting event!

title: Cloudflare outage hits major web services including X, LinkedIn and Zoom – business live
summary: Cloudflare is currently investigating problems affecting its Cloudflare Dashboard and associated APIs. The company has acknowledged the issues but has not provided specific details on their cause or impact. Users may experience disruptions while these matters are being addressed.

title: Labour announces plans to lift 550,000 children out of poverty – UK politics live
summary: Labour leader Keir Starmer has announced a child poverty strategy, labeling it a "moral mission." The plan includes initiatives to improve childcare and assist families in transitioning out of temporary housing. Starmer emphasizes the importance of addressing child poverty as a central priority for his party.
